overview: Jack , a youth of Arab descent, was forced to continue the shop owned by his father, Wak Dollah. In order to follow the wishes of his father, Jack is willing to study in a department that is not in line with the world of art that he loves. It is almost seven years he studies there and still does not graduate. The atmosphere become increasingly heated when Wak Dollah learns of Jack's closeness with a Chinese girl, Meyling, Halim's only child. He is the famous owner of a Chinese medicine shop in Surabaya.
title: Jack
